name: GeoNLP Annotator
description: GeoNLP Annotator用 Google Chrome Extentionです。
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://maps.googleapis.com https://maps.google.com https://maps-api-ssl.google.com https://maps.gstatic.com https://*.googleapis.com https://dias.ex.nii.ac.jp https://geonlp.ex.nii.ac.jp http://geonlp.ex.nii.ac.jp; object-src 'self'
